dreaming_journey_to_the_west:FireTouchPo.NAME: Fire Touch
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever an Attack deals unblocked damage, apply #b%d #yscorch .

dreaming_journey_to_the_west:FieryEyesPo.NAME: Fiery Eyes
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, apply #yscorch  to ALL enemies.

dreaming_journey_to_the_west:BloodThirst.NAME: Blood Thirsty
DESCRIPTIONS: Heal HP equal to unblocked damage x0.33 #b%d . Loses #b%d HP at the start of each turn.

dreaming_journey_to_the_west:SeventyTwoS.NAME: Seventy-Two Slashes
DESCRIPTIONS: Your next #yAttack that costs 2 or less is played #b%d times this turn.

dreaming_journey_to_the_west:FireBarrier.NAME: Fire Barrier
DESCRIPTIONS: When attacked,，give #b%d  #yscorch back .

dreaming_journey_to_the_west:FireApeStri.NAME: Fire Ape Strikes
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a Attack card with #y boxing ,deal #b%d damage to a random enemy. Whenever you play a Skill card with #y boxing ,gain #b%d Plated Armor.

dreaming_journey_to_the_west:Indignation.NAME: Indignation
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain #b%d #yStrength ,lose #r%d HP。

dreaming_journey_to_the_west:AttackMirag.NAME: Attack Mirage
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card with #y boxing,gain #r%d Vigor 。

dreaming_journey_to_the_west:DefenceMira.NAME: Defence Mirage
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card with #y boxing,gain #r%d Tenacity

dreaming_journey_to_the_west:BoostPower.NAME: Boost
DESCRIPTIONS: All attack damage dealt is increased by #b%d %% ,lasts #r%d rounds.

dreaming_journey_to_the_west:IronBonePow.NAME: Iron Bone
DESCRIPTIONS: All attack damage receive is decreased by #b%d %% (MAX #b80%% ) ,lose Half at the end of each round.

dreaming_journey_to_the_west:BurnBloodPo.NAME: Burn Blood
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you lose HP from a card,  gain #b%d #bIronBone .

dreaming_journey_to_the_west:PhantomAssa.NAME: Phantom Assault
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, add #b%d #yPhantomStab into your hand.

dreaming_journey_to_the_west:ControlPhan.NAME: Control Phantom
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, play  your #b%d (1+ expansioncontent:Temp_HP)cards from left to right.

dreaming_journey_to_the_west:Concentrate.NAME: Concentrate Energy
DESCRIPTIONS: At end of turn, lose #b%d #yVigor gain #b%d #yStrength

dreaming_journey_to_the_west:VellusPower.NAME: Vellus

dreaming_journey_to_the_west:TenacityPow.NAME: Tenacity

dreaming_journey_to_the_west:Agglomerate.NAME: Agglomerate

dreaming_journey_to_the_west:RampantBloo.NAME: Rampant Blood
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you lose HP, gain #b%d #yVigor.

dreaming_journey_to_the_west:ThumpPower.NAME: Thump Power
DESCRIPTIONS: Can not get #yPower from self ,last #b%d turns .

dreaming_journey_to_the_west:BlownSandPo.NAME: Blown Sand
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a #yBlownSand , gains #b%d #yStrength.

dreaming_journey_to_the_west:CursePower.NAME: Curse
DESCRIPTIONS: Every #b5 amount, lose #r5 HP,halve at the end of each turn. Current amount: #b%d.

dreaming_journey_to_the_west:DeathCurseP.NAME: Death Curse
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you receive attack damage from this enemy, applies #b%d #yCurse .

dreaming_journey_to_the_west:PoisonousPi.NAME: Poisonous Pill

dreaming_journey_to_the_west:ReboundDama.NAME: Rebound
DESCRIPTIONS: In #b%d turns, whenever you completely block damage, deal that much damage to the attacker.
